title: Searge: 武器攻击冷却时间可能会进行调整
author: obby825
txt_content:
Searge: The current settings for weapon cooldowns, damage resistance and especially the creeper explosions are not final and will change again
Searge: 当前的武器冷却、伤害抗性，特别是爬行者的爆炸伤害还没有最终确定，它们会被再次修改。

replies.author: sam3737
replies.txt_content: 真是个好消息！

废话
那么是调短调小呢还是调坑呢
